inclusion.criterion: Metastatic stage with at least one lesion identifiable on the conventional balance sheet other than a liver injury
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: CXR was remarkable for metastatic lesions

inclusion.criterion: Patient progressing under a 1st line of hormone therapy
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Life expectancy of at least 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.label: met

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: She is a candidate for tumor resection and agrees to do so prior to chemotherapy

exclusion.criterion: HER2 overexpressing primary tumor in immunohistochemistry
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.label: unknown
not_met
exclusion.evidence: She does not smoke or consume alcohol

exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Serious illness or comorbidity assessed at risk

exclusion.criterion: History of cancer within 5 years, with the exception of cutaneous carcinomas other than melanomas, or carcinoma in situ of the cervix
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer. A core biopsy revealed a 3 cm invasive ductal breast carcinoma in the left upper outer quadrant.
